fr.playsoft.android.tools.resource

Class MemoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.playsoft.android.tools.resource.MemoryManager

  • public class MemoryManager
extends Object
    Class that manages memory buffers. Creates them dynamically if needed and enables app to reuse unused buffers.
    Author:
    Olgierd Uzieblo

      • getMemorySlot

        public static MemorySlot getMemorySlot()
        Gets more memory, allocates new slot if needed.
        Returns:
        Free MemorySlot.

      • removeDeallocatedMemorySlots

        public static void removeDeallocatedMemorySlots()
        Removes unused memory slots except the initial slots (MINIMAL_MEMORY_SLOTS_NUMBER).

      • deallocateMemorySlots

        public static void deallocateMemorySlots(List<MemorySlot> pSlots)
        Deallocates multiple memory slots.
        Parameters:
        pSlots - List of slots to deallocate.

      • calculateTotalSize

        public static int calculateTotalSize(List<MemorySlot> pMemorySlots)
        Calculates total size of data in memory slots.
        Parameters:
        pMemorySlots - List of filled memory slots.
        Returns:
        Size of data in those slots.
